headline.main: DEEP NAZI WEDGE CLAIMED AT TULA; Berlin Reports 14 Villages in Stalinogorsk Area Taken and Skopin Menaced

lead_paragraph: BERLIN, Nov. 27 (U.P.) -- German armored armies slashing into both Moscow flanks have captured Klin, fifty-one miles to the northwest, and fourteen towns "lying to the rear of the Soviet lines and fortifications" in the Tula area anchoring the capital's southern defenses, Nazi sources claimed tonight.
abstract: Germans claim deep wedge at Tula
